PerformanceMeasurementDefinition.ns2:desc: PFM measurement model generated by the PM EBS transformer

measurementGroup.name: UtranCellRelation
measurementGroup.desc: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UtranCellRelation area.

measurement.ns2:desc: Description: The number of handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to B2 measurement report. Trigger: MobilityFromEUTRACommand towards the UTRAN cell is sent to the UE when a B2 measurement (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered) has been reported from UE.

Description: The number of handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to B2 measurement report. Trigger: MobilityFromEUTRACommand towards the UTRAN cell is sent to the UE when a B2 measurement (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered) has been reported from UE.

Description: The number of handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to B2 measurement report with trigger quantity RSRP. Trigger: MobilityFromEUTRACommand towards the UTRAN cell is sent to the UE when a B2 measurement with RSRP has been reported from UE.

Description:The number of successful handovers to UTRAN due to B2 measurement report. Trigger: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) when a B2 measurement (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered) has been reported from UE.

Description: The number of successful handovers to UTRAN due to B2 measurement report with trigger quantity RSRP. Trigger: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) when a B2 measurement with RSRP has been reported from UE.

Description:The number of SRVCC handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to B2 measurement report. Trigger: MobilityFromEUTRACommand towards the UTRAN cell is sent to the UE including a VoIP bearer when a B2 measurement (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered) has been reported from UE.

Description: The number of SRVCC handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to B2 measurement report with trigger quantity RSRP. Trigger: MobilityFromEUTRACommand towards the UTRAN cell is sent to the UE including a VoIP bearer when a B2 measurement with RSRP has been reported from UE.

Description: The number of successful SRVCC handovers to UTRAN due to B2 measurement report. Trigger: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause S1 Handover Triggered including a VoIP bearer whte a B2 measurement (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered) has been received from UE.

Description: The number of successful SRVCC handovers to UTRAN due to B2 measurement report with trigger quantity RSRP. Trigger: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause S1 Handover Triggered including a VoIP bearer when a B2 measurement with RSRP has been received from UE.

Description: The total number of outgoing WCDMA handover preparation attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT is received and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of successful outgoing WCDMA handover preparation attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT is received with successful result and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of outgoing WCDMA handover execution attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT is received and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of successful outgoing WCDMA handover execution attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT is received with successful result and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of outgoing WCDMA SRVCC handover preparation attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT is received with the SRVCC type set to "CS and PS" or "CS only" and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of successful outgoing WCDMA SRVCC handover preparation attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT is received with with successful result, the SRVCC type set to "CS and PS" or "CS only", and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of outgoing WCDMA SRVCC handover execution attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT is received with the SRVCC type set to "CS and PS" or "CS only" and the cause of handover is ATO.

Description: The total number of successful outgoing WCDMA SRVCC handover execution attempts in connection with Admission-Triggered Offload. The counter is created in OSS from the event INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT. Trigger: OSS steps this counter when the events INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT is received with with successful result, the SRVCC type set to "CS and PS" or "CS only", and the cause of handover is ATO.
